|brand = Linksys |model = AE1000 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = May 3, 2010 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Linksys_AE1000 |sernum = JVL0 |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle
|vendor_id = 13b1 |device_id = 002f |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = Q87-WUSB600NV2,Q87-AE1000 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:25:9C,68:7F:74
|chip1 = Ralink;RT3572; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/08/2010 |estreldate = 03/31/2010 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 745883589395 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B003B20F5E |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The FCC ID of the device (Q87-AE1000) redirects to Q87-WUSB600NV2. The device is a rebranded [[Linksys WUSB600N v2]].
Dual-Band
This adapter is not supported by the Generic Ralink RT307X drivers unless you manually install them.
"P/N: 141852220004J R0A" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
AE1000 serial numbers appear to start with '''JVL0'''.
{{WiFiCert|WFA8354|12/11/2009}}
